name: NiceGO
0:
”Alexa, open the garage door”
”Alexa, close the garage door”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Control your Nice G.O. garage doors and gates with voice.

You must have an existing Nice G.O. account before enabling the skill. To create an account:
- Install the Nice G.O. app (https://na.niceforyou.com/features/nice-go-app/)
- Click "create account" to create a new account.

You must also have devices paired with the Nice G.O. app.

To get started with the Nice G.O. skill, select the 'Enable Skill' button in the Alexa app to link your Nice G.O. account and discover your devices.
The devices will have the same names as in the Nice G.O. app, but they can be changed in the device settings if needed.

After setting up the skill, you will be able to control your devices with the following commands:

Garage door openers:
- Alexa, open the garage door.
- Alexa, close the garage door.
- Alexa, turn on the garage light.
- Alexa, turn off the garage light.
- Alexa, open "device name".
- Alexa, close "device name".

Gates:
- Alexa, open "device name".
- Alexa, close "device name".

If you have any questions, please visit the Nice G.O. FAQ at https://na.niceforyou.com/features/nice-go-app/
